thread.title: Hall County Elections Board member charged with shoplifting boxers
thread.title_full: Hall County Elections Board member charged with shoplifting boxers

author: Ellen Eldridge
title: Hall County Elections Board member charged with shoplifting boxers
text:
A Hall County Elections Board member and former officer in the Hall County Republican Party has been charged with shoplifting two pairs of men's boxer briefs from Wal-Mart in Gainesville, police said.
The boxers were reportedly worth $30.
Thomas Sandoval told the Gainesville Times he is not guilty of an alleged theft from the Wal-Mart at 400 Shallowford Road.
“I’ve been wrongfully charged,” Sandoval said Tuesday.
Sandoval was booked at the Hall County Jail on Friday and released on a cash bond, records show.
Read more of the story here .
